episodes.summary: August 9, 2009 - The mining of 80's cartoons and toys into movies continues with G.I. Joe: the Rise of Cobra, which opened in theaters this weekend. Josh and Ron braved the film and had some surprising opinions and revelations about it.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #195 - X-Men Forever #4
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 2, 2009 - We're still a little worse for the wear after San Diego, but that doesn't stop Ron from giggling over X-Men Forever #4 and surprisingly Josh, Conor and the iFanbase were okay with it. Glamourpuss on the other hand...

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Green Lantern: First Flight
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 30, 2009 - Conor Kilpatrick, Ron Richards, and iFanboy staff writer Paul Montgomery gather together to discuss the first movie starring Hal Jordan -- Green Lantern: First Flight!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #194- The Amazing Spider-Man #600
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 26, 2009 - It's a brief one this week as we record from the San Diego Comic Con with Conor, Josh, Ron, Jimski and Gordon the Intern. No "official" show notes this week. Enjoy the hilarit

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #193 - Scalped #30
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 19, 2009 - The heat is setting in, San Diego looms and the passive-aggressiveness is on overdrive this week as we discuss the comics of the week...

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #192 - Wednesday Comics #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 12, 2009 - Things get awkward on many levels this week. Let's just leave it at that, ok? Look! Wednesday Comics #1! Moving on....

episodes.title: Talksplode #13 with John Arcudi - Writer of BPRD and Wednesday Comics (Superman)
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 9, 2009 - Staff writer Paul Montgomery and Josh Flanagan spend some quality time with John Arcudi, best known for his recent work on Dark Horse's BPRD, Aliens and Predator series and the Superman strip in Wednesday Comics from DC with Lee Bermejo. You may have also seen his work in USA Comics 70th Anniversary Special from Marvel as well. John is a veteran of the industry, and we spend a lot of time talking about his recent projects, as well as how he thinks about writing, as well as wondering if there's anyone better for killing than Nazis. Hint: there isn't. Plus, at the end, we get a little inspirational, with help from John Mellencamp.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #191 - Batman and Robin #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 5, 2009 - The Batmania continues, as does the pure joy and love for all things G.I. Joe...and Ron loses it.

episodes.title: Booksplode #1 - Starman Omnibus Vol. 1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 2, 2009 - It's a big long and heated discussion about the first installment of the James Robinson and Tony Harris masterpiece, Starman. Josh, Conor, and staff writers Sonia Harris and Paul Montgomery discuss the book in depth, and really talk about the things that work and don't work in the story. Considered by many to be among the best superhero comics ever written, we'll talk about Jack and Ted Knight, The Mist, the O'Dares and everything that's great about Opal City.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #190 - Detective Comics #854
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 28, 2009 - It's a three way agreement on the POW for the first time in a while, and yes, it's starting to get hot. Plus Destro and Cobra Commander!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Transformers 2: Revenge of the Fallen
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 28, 2009 - the sequel everyone's been waiting for, including Josh, Transformers 2 hits theaters and we have GOT to tell you what iFanboy thought of it.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #189 - Phonogram: The Singles Club #3
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 21, 2009 - It's podcastin' insanity as this week's episode of the Pick of the Week Podcast was recording LIVE in front of an audience on UStream.tv. You never know what craziness can occur on a live show, and even Mario shows up for a little bit as well as...Dr. Tiki?

episodes.title: Talksplode #12 with Joe Kelly - writer of I Kill Giants, Amazing Spider-Man, and more.
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 18, 2009 -Josh and Paul talk to Joe Kelly about all the great work he's been putting out lately, like our June Book of the Month, I Kill Giants, as well as Amazing Spider-Man, Four Eyes, Douglas Fredericks and the House of They, Bad Dog, and Bang Tango. We also go way back to Kelly's start at Marvel, his work on Deadpool and his defection from X-Men, and his long time work with Superman. These days he's working on animation projects with his partners Joe Casey, Steven T. Seagle and Duncan Rouleau at Man of Action, as well as doing creator owned books with Image and Vertigo. It's a lot of comic talk packed into this hour-plus conversation.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #188 - Red Robin #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 14, 2009 - This week on the iFanboy Pick of the Week Podcast: mid-western food chains, the tragic plight of the super hero sculptor, Bunk Moreland, and... oh yeah -- comics!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #187 - Batman and Robin #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 7, 2009 - Pick of the Week! Book of the Month! More books than we know what to do with. And it just might be getting hot again. Somehow we also very briefly talk about Die Hard, but who knows how that came up?

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #186 - Spider-Man: The Short Halloween #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 31, 2009 - This week while Ron and Conor gush over their comics, Josh reverts back to his grumpy, 2005-era comic book hating ways. But at least everyone can agree that Reign of Fire is awesome.

episodes.title: Talksplode #11 with Sam Kieth of My Inner Bimbo, the Maxx, Batman and more
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 28, 2009 - Ron talks with one of his favorite creators Sam Kieth about his new book from Oni Press, My Inner Bimbo as well as his landmark series The Maxx, the cartoon version of The Maxx, what it was like to be publishing comics in the 90s boom at Image, his upcoming work on Batman, working with other artists and the stacks of sketchbooks and ideas he has for future graphic novels.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #185 - Captain America #50
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 24, 2009 - The iFanboy gang is back together! Conor has returned and joins Josh and Ron in discussing this week's books, Alan Moore's latest, the Book of the Month and avoid insulting anyone. Shocking.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #184 - G.I. Joe Cobra #3
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 17, 2009 - Conor is still away, and we are joined by staff writer Sonia Harris, in his stead. It was a giant week of comics, and everyone found something to love. Plus, Josh finds a way to offend the homeless!

episodes.title: Talksplode #10 with Chris Eliopoulos of Lockjaw and the Pet Avengers, Franklin Richards, and Misery Love Sherman
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 14, 2009 - Josh talks with our favorite multitasker in comics about his work on Lockjaw and the Pet Avengers, Franklin Richards: Son of a Genius, and his daily webcomic, Misery Loves Sherman. Chris even manages to talk about lettering, which makes sense since in addition to all these other projects, he's one of the leading letterers in comics. Plus he has no recollection of the knish event of New York Comicon 2008.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #183 - War of Kings #3
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 10, 2009 - Last week Ron was away, and this week Conor is off jetsetting about the globe. Luckily we have a fantastic group of pinch hitters, and this week Jim Mroczkowski joins us to talk about how he hates gruesome horror comics, yet doesn't. Ron has event fever, and Josh says "That's mighty queer."

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Star Trek
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 8, 2009 - The time has come! Star Trek has finally beamed into our brains! Whether you're a hardcore Trekkie (we refuse to use the term Trekker) or a total Federation noob, join the iFanboys as they take a look at J.J. Abrams' attempt to resuscitate the once mighty sci-fi franchise!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #182 - Justice Society of America #26
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 3, 2009 - With Ron away on a slow boat to nowhere, Mike Romo steps up to the microphone as Josh shows his Maine pride and Conor misses his mouth.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - X-Men Origins: Wolverine
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 3, 2009 - Coming off the heels of the movie we'd like to forget, X3, we get X-Men Origins: Wolverine. Hugh Jackman is back along with a bunch of other mutants to show how just how he became the best there is...and introduces us to Wolverine's jacket

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #181 - Invincible #61
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 26, 2009 - It's the first heatwave of 2009 and if you're a longtime listener, you know what that means - the iFanboys start to lose their minds. Especially Josh.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #180 - Green Lantern Corps #35
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 19, 2009

episodes.title: Talksplode #9 with Ed Brubaker of Captain America, Incognito, Daredevil, and Angel of Death
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 16, 2009 - Josh and Ron catch up with the very busy Ed Brubaker. We cover a whole lot of ground including the live action web series Angel of Death, written by Ed and starring Zoe Bell. We talk about Ed's early cartooning work, as well as Captain America, Daredevil, Incognito, and the upcoming Marvels Project. Then we try to convince him to see My Blue Heaven. Well, not in that order.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #179 - Batman: Battle For The Cowl #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 12, 2009 - The (iFan)boys are back in town! A light week of average books leads to lots of meandering discussion and idgressions. Oh, and Ron has a mental break down in the middle of the show.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #178 - The Flash: Rebirth #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 5, 2009 - The inmates are running the asylum! iFanboy staff writers Jim Mroczkowski, Paul Montgomery, Mike Romo, and Sonia Harris have wrestled control of the Pick of the Week Podcast away from Josh, Ron and Conor! What will they do with unfettered access to microphones and a captive audience? Will they make the most of it, or will this be their single, shining moment in the sun?

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #177 - The Umbrella Academy: Dallas #5
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 29, 2009 - The guys are together and things get a bit loopy. This week, Josh throws caution to the breeze, Conor gets let go, Ron fails at dramatic reading, and all the guys get underestimated!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #176 - G.I. Joe: Cobra #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 22, 2009 -A light, but quality week which leads to much arguing and general happy fun time with the comics!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #175 - Captain Britain and MI13 #11
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 15, 2009 - It's one of those shows! No one agrees on anything and that's the way we like it. It was a great book! It was an awful book! Who can say?

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Wonder Woman
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 13, 2009 - Staff Writers Paul Montgomery and Sonia Harris join Conor Kilpatrick to talk Wonder Woman, the latest DCUniverse Animated Original Movie from producer Bruce Timm. Is this fourth release the best one yet? And will a Nathan Fillion lovefest randomly break out in the middle? There's only one way to find out!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #174 - Superman: World of New Krypton #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 8, 2009 - With WonderCon and Watchmen on the brain, it's time to talk comics!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Watchmen
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 6, 2009 - Well, the impossible has happened and we're here to discuss it. Conor, Josh and Ron discuss the Watchmen film directed by Zach Snyder

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #173: Savage Dragon #145
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 1st, 2009 - We're in San Francisco for WonderCon, it's late, Josh is punchy and we've got G.I. Joe on the brain. No show notes due to thhe fact that we're at the convention all weekend, so accept our apologies and enjoy the madness.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #172: Guardians of the Galaxy #10
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 22, 2009 - Ron's back, Conor's somewhat healthy and Josh is...well, he's Josh. This week is full of excitement and wonder as we tackle this week's books, Scott Pilgrim and give the info on WonderCon in SF!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #171: Scalped #25
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 15, 2009 - When Ron's away, Paul Montgomery will play, and things will get wacky. Also, Conor's microphone hates him.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #171: Scalped #25
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 8, 2009 - No show notes because we were at the New York Comic Con - sorry?.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #169: Battlefields: Dear Billy #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 1, 2009 - In which the iFanboys can't remember what anyone's doing or what their names are.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #168: Dark Avengers #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com

episodes.title: Talksplode #8 with Duane Swierczynski of Immortal Iron Fist, Cable, and Werewolf by Night
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 22nd, 2009 - Josh and Ron talk to Marvel exclusive writer and crime novelist, Duane Swierczynski about his work on Immortal Iron Fist, Cable, Dead of Night: Werewolf by Night, and more. Swierczynski is suddenly penning several monthly books at Marvel, and we ask about how it compares to his previous work in prose fiction, and journalism. Plus, what is it about Philadelphia?

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #167: I Kill Giants #7
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 18, 2009 - There's a cold tearing its way through the iFanboy offices. We apologize for the sniffling.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #166: Hellboy The Wild Hunt #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 11, 2009 - Ron is back and it's a light week of books that leads Josh to spread some love to Hellboy.

episodes.title: Talksplode #7 with Matthew Sturges of DC and Vertigo Comics
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 8th, 2009 - Josh talks to Austin, Texas based comic writer Matthew Sturges about becoming a DC Exclusive writer, and his work with Bill Willingham on Vertigo Comics Jack of Fables and House of Mystery, his DCU work on Salvation Run and Blue Beetle, as well as upcoming projects like Justice Society of America and Run!, plus his upcoming novel, Midwinter.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #165: Justice Society of America #22
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 4, 2009 - It's a new year, and Ron is nowhere to be seen. Luckily we have the discussion stylings of Jim Mroczkowski to fill in. There are lecherous blind superheroes and ridiculous chairs in comics this week, and we don't miss any of them.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - The Spirit
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 4, 2009 - Josh, Conor and Paul gather to discuss the movie, Frank Miller's The Spirit

episodes.title: iFanboy.com 2008 Year End All Media Spectacular!
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 28, 2008 - It's our third annual All Media Spectacular where we discuss everything we enjoyed in 2008 from movies, to television, to podcasts, to music, to video games and of course, comic books. Enjoy!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #164: Ex-Machina #40
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 21, 2008 - It's a raucous time, with some semi intelligent discussion thrown in, topped off by more than a little awkwardness. But you're probably used to that by now. Also, Conor forgets Josh's name, and we try to break up a wedding.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #163: Nightwing #151
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 14, 2008 - Ron is freaked out by David Lapham, Josh channels Joey Lawrence, and Conor can't remember the name of The Dominators! All this plus a special announcement. The Pipettes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #162: X-Men Noir #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 7, 2008 - This week, we talk about a book that either makes a lot of sense for Ron to pick, or no sense at all. Plus, we get into an Almost Famous mood. Please accept our apologies.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Punisher: War Zone
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 7, 2008 - The third Frank Castle movie in twenty years has hit the screen and iFanboy is all over this one. It's The Punisher vs. the mob and the filmmakers vs. the audience!

episodes.title: Talksplode #6 with Jim McCann of Marvel Comics
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 4,2008 - ***SPOILER ALERT*** Warning! During this episode of Talksplode, we talk about the end of Secret Invasion, which occurs in Secret Invasion #8. If you don't want it spoiled for you, we advise you read that comic first. We sat down with Jim McCann of Marvel Comics for our annual chat where we ask Jim the question you provided a few weeks ago. The conversation ranges from the business of comics, to geeky character love to hearing about Jim's new change in career as he begins writing comics

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #161: Nova #19
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 30, 2008 - Things get a bit testy when the guys have to assign each other Green Lantern rings and a big anniversary is completely forgotten about. Looks like someone's gonna be sleeping on the couch for the next month...

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #160: Robin #180
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 23, 2008 - Streamed live during recording, Conor picks a personal favorite that made him happy in a sea of mediocre books. Chuck Austen may want to avoid this one.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #159: Detective Comics #850
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 16, 2008 - Hell has frozen over, as Ron made an unexpected week that involves a bat

episodes.title: Talksplode #5 with Brian Wood of DMZ, Northlanders, Local and New York Four
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 13,2008 - Josh and Ron spend some time talking with renowned comic writer Brian Wood about his work on DMZ, Northlanders, Local, the New York Four, and everything in between. It's ever so slightly possible that we even start in on some of the ways politics and current events effects Brian's stories, as well as the difference between working short term and long term. And finally, we answer the question of why that viking isn't on a boat like a viking should be.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #158: Final Crisis: Resist
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 9, 2008 - It was a bit of a dry week, and Conor had a hard time with that, but luckily Josh didn't as he found a bit of gold in DC event of the year, Final Crisis

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #157: Battlefields: The Night Witches #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 2, 2008 - This week, we did the show live, with an audience as we recorded. But for you, basically the same thing. Luckily, that thing is excellence.

episodes.title: Talksplode #4 with Eric Canete of End League and Iron Man: Enter the Mandarin
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 30,2008 - We're back with more creator conversation goodness, and this time, we're talking to artist Eric Canete, current artist on End League, written by former Talksplode guest Rick Remender. You might also know Eric's work from Iron Man: Enter the Mandarin, written by other former Talksplode guest Joe Casey. Weird coincidence, right? Josh and Eric talk about his time working in Animation on such projects as Aeon Flux, Justice League Unlimited, The Batman, and the Legion of Superheroes, and coming back to work in comics again. Then, the tables turn, and he starts interviewing Josh, which might be an iFanboy Talksplode first, and some really great conversation follows.

episodes.author: ifanboy.com

episodes.author: ifanboy.com

episodes.title: Talksplode #3 with Joe Casey of Godland, Charlatan Ball, Youngblood, Zen, Velocity, and World War Robot
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 9,2008 - Josh and Joe Casey talk about all sorts of things comics, and Josh didn't storm off in disgust once. From his work at Image, with Godland, Youngblood, and Charlatan Ball, and his other titles like Velocity from Wildstorm, World War Robot from IDW, and Zen from Devil's Due, we go over some of Joe's massive body of work with Marvel, DC, and other companies. Hear about the pitch that never happened, and how Joe first broke into Marvel, as well as a lot more.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #153 - Top Ten: Season 2 #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 5, 2008 - An odd week of comics leads the iFanboys down some strange roads.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #151 - Echo #6
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 21, 2008 - With Ron away for the weekend, iFanboy staff writer Sonia Harris steps up to the microphone. Long Island accent out, London accent in.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Talksplode #2 with Rick Remender of Fear Agent, Punisher War Journal, and End League
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 18,2008 - Josh and Ron have a long talk with comic creator Rick Remender, writer of Fear Agent, End League, Punisher War Journal, Booster Gold, and the upcoming Gigantic. Rick's doing work for just about every publisher out there, and the projects are all over the place in terms of genre. We talk with him about working on comics, and doing creator owned work as well as licensed work for hire. This one's probably not so much for the kids, because after all, this is the guy who write the line "Let nun suck.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #150 - Invincible #52 and Audience E-Mails
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 14, 2008 - iFanboy celebrates its 150th episode with a double-sized all-e-mail spectacular! With no topic off-limits and a late night recording time, it's iFanboy's most personal (and awkward?) show to date!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #149 - The Roberts #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 7, 2008 - True crime and grisly murder take over this week's show!

You can check out his Top Cow Pilot Season Book, Urban Myths and don't forget to vote for it at the Top Cow Blog

No show notes this week - go to iFanboy.com for show notes later in the week.

episodes.summary: July 20, 2008 - The sequel to Batman Begins, The Dark Knight is finally upon us and iFanboy is here with the least controversial special edition podcast ever to talk about it.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Batman: Gotham Knight
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 17, 2008 - Conor Kilpatrick is joined by iFanboy staff writers Paul Montgomery and Jim Mroczkowski to discuss the latest in DC's straight-to-DVD animated movies, Batman: Gotham Knight. On the eve of the release of The Dark Knight, how will an anime anthology about Batman rate? The answer may surprise you!

episodes.summary: July 13, 2008 - The much anticipated sequel, Hellboy 2: The Golden Army was released this past weekend and the iFanboy crew discusses whether or not Mignola and Guillermo Del Toro have another hit on their hands.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #140 - The Sword #9
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 6, 2008 - In this episode, Ron makes a brief return to the East Coast, Josh makes a surprise revelation, and Conor challenges a group of people to a fight. The temperature must be rising.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Paul Cornell
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 3,2008 - Josh and Conor sat down with Paul Cornell, writer of Marvel's Wisdom, Captain Britain and MI13 and the upcoming Fantastic Four True Story, as well as countless novels and television projects. We talk about his work with Marvel, Dr. Who, among other things, and generally have a good time.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #139 - Final Crisis #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 29, 2008 - Everyone had a giant stack of comics to choose from this week, and thankfully we made it through unscathed. In the end, Conor was tickled by his old favorite, the big DC event book, but there were plenty of other good choices as well. And who is this Josh who's been showing up lately? 00:53:20 - Nate found a great deal. We love that.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Wanted
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 29,2008 - Wanted, the movie inspired by the comic by Mark Milar and J.G. Jones was released this weekend and we're here to tell you what we thought and Conor tries to curve and audio bullet.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #138 - Scalped #18
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 22, 2008 - The gang's back together this week, and it's business as usual, as Josh tries to prove that he doesn't hate fun, starting by picking the best, yet least fun book on the market as his favorite.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - B. Clay Moore
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 22,2008 - A couple of week's back, a blog post from writer B. Clay Moore, spawned a response from Josh. They got in touch, and decided to have a nice civil chat about their points of view, among other things about how Moore got to where he is, and what it's like to produce indie comics. We'll also get a rundown of the numerous projects Moore has out there in shops, such as Hawaiian Dick, Casey Blue: Beyond Tomorrow, 76, and more. Plus, get ready to hear the best damn Robert Kirkman impersonation you've ever heard.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week #137 - Local #12
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 15, 2008 - Josh is on vacation this week, and so new iFanboy staff writer Mike Romo jumps in to fill Mr. Flanagan's shoes.

episodes.summary: June 15,2008 - It's iFanboy at the Movies! New iFanboy staff writer Paul Montgomery sits in for a vacationing Josh alongside Conor and Ron to talk about The Incredible Hulk. Strap on a backpack, hang your head, and start walking down that long lonely road.

episodes.title: iFanboy Special Edition Podcast:  Q and A with MARVEL COMICS
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October, 11 2007 - We sat down with Jim McCann, Marvel's marketing/PR guy, and answered YOUR questions. It's a long one, but it's worth it as we discuss everything from the ins and outs of the comic book business at Marvel to totally geeky things like Jim's ideal Avengers lineup. If you dig Marvel or the comic book business, you HAVE to listen to this. We can't thank Jim enough for spending 2 hours with us, answering your questions and geeking out over comics. We all had a blast recording this, and I have to admit, I was so pleased to see the level of questions posted by everyone. So thank you for your questions, as without them we wouldn't have had much to talk about! Head to iFanboy.com to see your questions, in lieu of show notes. We tried to ask every question, but we skipped a few that were redundant to earlier question (i.e. Zombies, late books etc). But we feel as if we covered pretty much the concept behind every question and I hope you agree.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Comics Podcasting: One Year Later @ the San Diego Comic Con
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 1, 2007 - This is the audio from the momentous second annual San Diego Comic-Con Comics Podcasters panel. It's One Year Later, and this year, the group consists of Mr. Phil from Indie Spinner Rack, Josh Flanagan from iFanboy.com, Ian Levenstein from Comic Timing, Jon Towry from Comic Talk Cafe, John Mayo from Comic Book Page, Scott Hinze from Fanboy Radio, and Jimmy Aquino from Comic News Insider. The panel was moderated by Vito DelSante. We discuss each of the shows, and where podcasting is headed in the future. Recorded on July 26, 2007 live from San Diego.

episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 15, 2006 - The Escapists #6 was the best book this week and for once we all agreed. Ron is finally coming around on Ultimate X-Men, while Conor is still confounded by Justice League of America. X-Factor and Robin just keep on rolling. We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Strangers In Paradise #86
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 8, 2006 - Strangers in Paradise #86 was a real tear jerker and the best book this week, coming close was Detective Comics #826, while Batman Confidential #1 blew. We LOVED Justice Society of America #1 and announced the winners of the Avengers Casting Contest We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Powers #21
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 1, 2006 - We're stuffed from another lovely Thanksgiving holiday and mull over the merits of X-Factor #13 as well as a bunch of other comics. We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - X-Factor #13
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 24, 2006 - We're stuffed from another lovely Thanksgiving holiday and mull over the merits of X-Factor #13 as well as a bunch of other comics. We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Checkmate #8
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 17, 2006 - Ron pulls out of his hat with Checkmate #8 and shocks the iFanboys. Civil War #5 didn't deliver the goods, we're sick of Iron Man and we still love the Escapists #5! You HAVE to read Project X: Cup Noodle (yes its Manga!) We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Fables #55
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 19, 2006 - Finally, Fables gets some iFanboy love as Josh picks issue #55 as the pick. Ron is in SF and chats up Phonogram #3 and of course Conor wants to talk Batman. We also answer listener e-mail and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Criminal #2 and One Year Anniversary
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 2, 2006 - Can you believe its been one full year? We can't. This week we briefly discuss the week's comics, with Criminal #2 as the pick of the week and spend over an hour answering YOUR questions. Stick around to the end for an extra bonus! Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Daredevil #90
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 27, 2006 - Yes, True Believers, the dynamic Daredevil returns to reign the Pick of the Week mantle! We also nod to Halloween with Impaler #1 and talk about some other books such as Planetary #26, Action Comics #844 and many others. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Wolverine #47
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 20, 2006 - Josh pulled a fast one and surpised us all with Wolverine #47 as his pick. In addition we discussed Queen and Country, The Flash, 52, and the recent relaunch of the Wildcats and The Authority. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Green Arrow #67
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 14, 2006 - It was a rough night out, and an even rougher next morning as we talk about Green Arrow #67. It's complaint week too as we grumble over Stan Lee Meets Dr. Strange #1, Uncanny X-Men #47, Gen 13 #1, and Ultimate Power #1. And surprisingly, we sing the praises of Invincible Vol. 7. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Criminal #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: October 6, 2006 - For our 50th episode, we welcome Jonathan London from Geekdrome as we discuss the pick of the week, Criminal #1. Other books discussed are Dr. Strange #1, The Irredeemable Ant-Man #1, The Boys #3 and Jonah Hex #12. We also answer listener e-mails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Batman #657
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 29, 2006 - Batman is the topic of discussion as Josh's doubleheader comes to end. Ultimate Spider-Man #100, Justice Leage of America #2, all the zany Civil War books, Jack of Fables and Animal Man are discussed as well. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Astonishing X-Men #17
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 22, 2006 - Josh makes his triumphant return to the show and picks Astonishing X-Men #17 as the best book of the week. We also talk about Wolverine #46, Civil War #4 and Strangers In Paradise #84 We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - 52 Week 19
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 15, 2006 - Ron and Conor alone this week as Josh is travelling. Conor picked the latest installment of 52, and we discuss Green Lantern, DMZ and Isotope Comics in SF. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Presents The Booth Babes of San Diego
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 12, 2006 - Just when you thought the coverage of the San Diego Comic Con was over, iFanboy brings you this little vignette into the world of the booth babes!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Cross Bronx #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 8, 2006 - We can't stop talking! We start with Ron's pick of Cross Bronx #1 and then talk about a bunch of other comics, including GI Joe Scarlett special, Nightwing, Detective Comics, Y:The Last Man and some trades, like Scott Pilgrim Vol. 1, Marvel Zombies and more! We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - X-Factor #10
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: September 1, 2006 - This week Josh picked X-Factor #10 and we discussed, All Star Superman #5, 52 #17, The Boys #2 as well as bunch of other books. Allan Heinberg got called out as well. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Justice League of America #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 25, 2006 - It's an exciting podcast this week, as welcome a special guest: Augie DeBlieck Jr. of Comic Book Resources' Pipeline Commentary and Podcast and boy did we talk about alot! Justice League of America #1, Uncle Scrooge #357, Daredevil #88, Ultimate Spider-Man #99 as well as practically every other comic published this week. We also answer listener e-mails and voicemails. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Phonogram #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 17, 2006 - It's a quiet week for comics which allows some smaller books to come to the forefront, mainly Phonogram #1 from Image Comics. We also discuss The Boys #1, Fell #6 and complain about delayed books. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - The Escapists #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 11, 2006 - It's almost like rerun summers here at iFanboy as Josh picks the second issue if The Escapists. Other books discussed include Ultimate Spider-Man Annual #2, Civil War Front Line #5 and Anniliation #1. Check iFanboy.com for the detailed show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Detective Comics #822
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 6, 2006 - This week, we're on Long Island swimming in Ron's parents' pool and we discussed Detective Comics #822, as well as 52 #13, Ultimate Spider-Man #98 and Uncanny X-Men #477 and we finally cool off.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com at the San Diego Comic Con 2006
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: August 2, 2006 - If you're a loyal iFanboy reader and listener, you may have picked up on a few hints as to what we've been up to recently. Finally, we're proud to present to you - the very first iFanboy video - iFanboy.com at the San Diego Comic Con 2006, with interviews with Joss Whedon, Bryan Singer, Greg Rucka, Paul Dini, Robert Kirkman, Grant Morrison and Little Rashy!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Astro City Special #1 : Samaritan
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 28, 2006 - We're back to our regular schedule and Ron chose Astro City Special #1 : Samaritan as the pick. We also talk about Civil War, the Daredevi shocker and the new Batman by Grant Morrisson. While we were in San Diego, we got a ton of listener e-mail and voicemails. Go to www.ifanboy.com to see the show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con - Day Three/Four and Wrap Up
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 24, 2006 - We can't believe its over, but we're back at home and seem to have survived the 2006 San Diego Comic Con. Listen to our final thoughts in out last San Diego con podcast

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con - Comics Podcasting Panel
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 23, 2006 - The complete audio recording of the Comics Podcasting Panel on July 23rd at the San Diego Comic Con.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con Day Two
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 21, 2006 - Day two of the con comes to a close and its an all time high as far as single days at a con go.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con Day One
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 20, 2006 - The first full day of the con is over and we run through the highlights from the dayt

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con Preview Night
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 19, 2006 - Our first report from the San Diego Comic Con - Preview Night

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast  - San Diego Comic Con Preview
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 17, 2006 - On the eve of our departure for San Diego, we get together for quick preview of the upcoming con

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - The Escapists #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 14, 2006 - Conor explains his shocking pick of The Escapists #1, as well as 52 #10, X-Men #188, listener e-mail and voicemails. Go to www.ifanboy.com to see the show notes

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Detective Comics #821
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 7, 2006 - Finally, a light week in comics that brings Detective Comics #821 as Josh's pick, as well discussion around Uncanny X-Men #475 and 52 Week #9. We answer a ton of listener e-mail and continue to get excited for the San Diego Comic Con.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Civil War Tie Ins and Dardevil #86
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: July 1, 2006 - Ron had a hard time picking from his stack of books, and ends up picking Wolverine #43, Amazing Spider-Man #533, X-Factor #8, Civil War Front Line #2, New Avengers #21 and Dardevil #86 as his picks of the week and explains why. Josh wraps up Lucifer #75, the last issue of that series and we talk about how we're buying way too many comics every week.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - Superman Returns
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 29, 2006 - We've all seen the movie and sit down to discuss what was good, what was bad and the difference between Superman Returns and X-Men: the Last Stand.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Astonishing X-Men #15
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 25, 2006 - Conor shocks the iFanboy faithful by picking Astonishing X-Men #15. We discuss how good 52 Week 7 and The Eternals were, and how bad The Flash #1 and New Avengers #20 was. Ron rants about comic covers and Josh learns to love letterers. We answer some more listener mail too. Go to www.ifanboy.com for detailed show notes.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Civil War #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 17, 2006 - You'd think we were getting paid by Marvel, what with our rabid coverage of Civil War, with this week's Civil War #2. But how could we not have picked it? Go to www.ifanboy.com for detailed show notes.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Civil War: Front Line #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 10, 2006 - We're back at full strength and ready to discuss Civil War: Front Line #1, as well as Wonder Woman, the Superman Returns prequel, the Watchmen Omnibus, as well as a few announcements including one about the San Diego Comic Con. Go to www.ifanboy.com for detailed show notes.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Superman/Batman #26
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: June 3, 2006 - Josh is out on vacation, so its up to Conor and Ron to discuss the all-star tribute to the late Sam Loeb in Batman/Superman #26 as well as Amazing Spider-Man #532 (and the Civil War ramifications), Son of M #6 and Queen and Country #30 (for which Josh joins in on the fun.) Go to www.ifanboy.com for detailed show notes.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Daredevil #85
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 29, 2006 - It was a week of quality reads, making Josh's pick a tough one, but the build up continues in Dardedevil, so that's where Josh's attention turned. Also discussed are the Civil War tie-ins Wolverine and She-Hulk, as well as the latest edition of Powers.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Special Edition Podcast - X-Men: The Last Stand
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 27, 2006 - Finally, the day had arrived, X-Men: the Last Stand was released in theaters on May 26 and team iFanboy excitedly went to see it with the highest of hopes, only to have them dashed by the mish-mash rushed filmmaking of Brett Ratner.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Green Arrow #62
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 21, 2006 - This week it's all about Green Arrow, as well as talk about the week's releases including Miller and Lee's Batman, Aquaman, Robin, and because you asked for it, Fell. Then it's listener mail, and the long awaited Vertigo discussion.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - 52 Week #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 14, 2006 - Conor to the rescue again this week as he delves into the first installment of DC comics 52 weekly comic event and comes out digging it. Teh event also leads to yet another discussion over event comics and crossovers. Can comic fans ever be satisfied? Not with the New Warriors eating it over in Civil War.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Teen Titans #35
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: May 7, 2006 - Josh is on vacation, so its just Ron to react in shock at Conor's pick of Teen Titans #35 and not Civil War #1 or Infinite Crisis #7, but he does have some good reasons.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - New Avengers Annual #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 30, 2006 - The Marvel train continues to roll as Josh chooses the unlikely, but excellent New Avengers Annual #1. We also dig into some talk about Batman and Ron gets nervous about what Joss Whedon is doing to Cyclops. Then, it's listener mail, where we talk about conventions, comic shop owners and Magneto and Electro for the last time

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Daredevil #84
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 23, 2006 - Ron gets his ass kicked by Daredevil #84, Conor and Josh report back from London and we answer a handful of listener e-mails.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Ultimate Spider-Man #93
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 16, 2006 - This week Josh tells us why he thought Ultimate Spider-Man #93 was the best of the lot. We also discuss an iffy Superman, a strange creative pairing on Green Arrow, and of course, more Loveless. Some listener letters go over comic book prices, physics, and where to buy your books. Conor's got a cold, and Ron's away this week, yet iFanboy soldiers on.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Detective Comics #818
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: April 9, 2006 - The 25th Episode Extravanganza! An Hour and Twenty Minutes dedicated to YOUR questions, oh as well as Conor's pick of the week - Detective Comics #818

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Queen & Country #29
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 26, 2006 - This week, Josh picked the British spy comic, Queen & Country. But then the sparks fly over New Avengers: The Illuminati. Was it really that good? Is it just an also-ran? We also dip into more books from One Year Later, and then, would a podcast be complete without talk of the Frappr map or listener mail? We say thee nay.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - She-Hulk #6
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 26, 2006 - Even She-Hulk is shocked that Ron picked her as the pick of the week, but at least she's not as clueless over the end of Loveless as Conor and Josh were

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Superman #650
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 19, 2006 - Conor's back on the Superman bandwagon, one year later, Ron's all a flutter for Nova, Josh was the only one who remembered to buy Fury and it looks like Runaways may be worth reading again. iFanboy at the movies: Conor reviews Ultimate Avengers and Josh gives his thoughs about V For Vendetta. Dini!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Ultimate Spider-Man #91
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 11, 2006 - A bit of a slow news week as Josh picks Ultimate Spider-Man #91, the crew discusses the trailer to X-Men #3, try to answer some listener mail and talk about why Runaways doesn't matter.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Infinite Crisis #5
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: March 4, 2006 - It's a shocker as Ron picks Infinite Crisis #5 and not a Marvel/X-Men book as the pick of the week. Conor bemoans One Year Later, we reminisce about G.I. Joe comics and discuss Frank Cho and Darkhawk. It's a good time.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Ultimate Wolverine vs. Hulk #2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 25, 2006 - Better late than never

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Daredevil #82
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 19, 2006 - This week, Conor and Josh chat about the exemplary Daredevil #82. Also covered are the New Avengers, Grant Morrison's talent, or lack thereof, and because you didn't ask for it, more talk about cowboy comics. It's a little late, but it's also a little good.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Jonah Hex #4
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 10, 2006 - This week, Josh and Conor expound on the western genre of comics as they drool over Jonah Hex #4. We're not buying into Warren Ellis's schtick with Next Wave #1. "Tales from the Con" makes its first appearance as we share awkaward moments at conventions. Listener mail asks about ads in comics and X-Men:Deadly Genesis, and Josh exlains why he's dropping 100 Bullets

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Gotham Central #40
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: February 3, 2006 - It's a sentimental podcast this week, as we reflect upon the final issue of Gotham Central. We also discuss the latest issues of X-Factor and Powers. Also, as a bonus, we discuss the graphic novel Tricked by Alex Robinson as well as celebrate the growth of our Frappr Map - http://www.frappr.com/ifanboy and answer some listener mail and give him a homework assignment and Robert Kirkman owes us $30 dollars.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Savage Dragon #122
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 27, 2006 - It's a shocking Pick of the Week as Ron chooses Savage Dragon #122 and NOT Daredevil #81, but that doesn't detract from how good Daredevil #81 was. We also answer some fantastic listener mail.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Strangers In Paradise #79
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 20, 2006 - Josh returns to the podcast and picks Strangers in Paradise #79 as the pick of the week and much love is given to Terry Moore and his comic book. We also discuss Infinite Crisis #4, the passing of the Flash and complain about how there are no more surprises in comics anymore.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Ultimate X-Men #66
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 13, 2006 - With Josh out of town, its up to Conor and Ron to helm the podcast. Conor's pick is Ultimate X-Men #66, Robert Kirkman's first issue on the title and the current state of the Ultimate X-Men is analyzed and discussed. Also listener e-mail yields a bunch of questions about various in and out of continuity stories. Plus, Ron still can't pronounce "Asgard"

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - 2005 Year End Round Up - Part 2
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 10, 2006 - Part 2 of the 2005 Year End round up. In the concluding podcast, we discuss the TV shows that rocked us in 2005, the video games that distracted us, and the comic books that, well, that we read. It's amazing we even recorded this what with World of Warcraft beckoning us.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - X-Men: The End Book 3: Men & X-Men #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 6, 2006 - The first podcast of 2006 and Ron only bought 5 books, well 4 and a half really, and of them X-Men: The End Book 3: Men & X-Men #1 is crowned the Pick of the Week. We continue to analyze the madness of Chris Claremont, time travel and sticking to continuity, as well as read and respond to some listener mail.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - 2005 Year End Round Up - Part 1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: January 1, 2006 - We here at iFanboy read a lot of comics, but we also take in a lot of other media. We thought that it might be fun to do a special podcast to chat about the best stuff we saw, read, watched, or played in the year that was. We discuss the best movies, TV shows, comics, and video games that made their way into our world in 2005.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - All Star Batman & Robin The Boy Wonder #3
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 30, 2005 - During a quiet winter holiday week, its a big week for comics as Conor picks All Star Batman & Robin The Boy Wonder #3 as his pick of the week. Other books released this week that were discussed include X-Factor #2, The New Avengers #14, Batman #648 and Daredevil #80. So many good comics, so little time to talk about them all!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Hellblazer #215
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 23, 2005 - It's a Christmas miracle, Josh picks Hellblazer #215 as his pick of the week, which was a tough decision since this week was full of such great comics. Some of the other comics discussed are Joe Casey's Iron Man, Geoff Johns disappointing work on Green Lantern, and Phil Jimenez's fine art on Infinite Crisis #3. Listener e-mail asks what good indie books should be checked out and the iFanboy boys share their Christmas wishes. Happy Holidays!

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - X-Factor #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 17, 2005 - Yes, oh yes, Ron can finally relax, as he celebrates the release of X-Factor #1 as his pick of the week. Marvel's What If and Secret War are the duds of the week. We read some listener e-mail and answer their questions and Josh realizes he completely missed out on Alex Robinson's graphic novel Tricked.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Gotham Central #38
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 9, 2005 - iFanboy.com loves Gotham Central, and more love is given for Gotham Central #38, which spawns the longest podcast ever. Conversation ranges from The Spectre to Infinite Crisis, from Kevin Smith to Robert Kirkman and back around to Penny Arcade and PVP.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Generation M #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: December 2, 2005 - Ron was the only who was able to pick up his books, which is a good thing since it was his pick. Unfortunately, Generation M #1, by Paul Jenkins and Ramon Bachs, was the best book of his stack. Also discussed is how Conor's local comic shop shut down.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Daredevil #79
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 26, 2005 - With Thanksgiving behind us, and our belts moved to a looser setting, Josh shares his surprising pick of the week, Dardevil #79 by Brian Michael Bendis and Aex Maleev.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - All-Star Superman #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 18, 2005 - It's Conor's turn to pick this week and he goes with All-Star Superman #1 from DC Comics. The mythos of Superman as corporate mascot is explored and we find out who the real fanboy of the group is.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Decimation: the House of M - The Day After #1
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 11, 2005 - Ron chooses Decimation: the House of M - The Day After #1 and much discussion is had over crossovers in comics and any merit they may or may not have. Infinite Crisis comes up as well, as the guys at iFanboy forget to watch the clock.

episodes.title: iFanboy.com Pick of the Week - Powers #14
episodes.author: ifanboy.com
episodes.summary: November 3, 2005, Josh chooses Powers #14 as his Pick of the Week and much fun is had by all.
